content:
## n8n@0.76.0 For a comprehensive list of changes, check out the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@0.75.0...n8n@0.76.0) for this version.
**Release date:** 2020-08-05 - New nodes - Customer.io Trigger - FTP - Medium - Philips Hue - TravisCI - Twake - Enhanced nodes - CrateDB - Move Binary Data - Nodes will now display a link to associated documentation
